permissions: Admins can update any GPS Insight vehicle. Non-admins can update vehicles only for brokers where they are members (the vehicle's broker must be in the user's member organizations).
side_effects: Updates the trailer and/or tractor assignments for a GPS Insight vehicle.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one of --trailer or --tractor must be specified. If a specified relationship flag is provided with an empty value, the relationship is cleared.
